bonus.value: Hitting targets with dodge skills inflicts bleed, dealing damage equal to 15%/19%/22.5%/26% of ATK every second for 5 seconds.
Reduce ATK of all targets within 8 meters that are taking damage over time by 10%/12%/13%/15%. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

mind.name: 朦胧
mind.desc: 起初，是追寻光的本能引导了雏鸟的破壳而出。

memory.name: 白纸
memory.desc: 从现在开始书写崭新人格塑形的过程吧。

belief.name: 简单
belief.desc: 同为失忆者，和你一样，总之想先去做力所能及的事。

emotion.name: 纯真
emotion.desc: 僵硬的神态表现也是这一本质的佐证。
